revised_title: Investigating the Properties and Comparison of Artificial Tannin and Natural Tannin Substances
tldr: The author investigates the properties of an artificial tanning substance and compares it to natural tannin substances. The artificial tannin is found to be more indestructible than natural tannins, with some differences in resistance to nitric acid among the natural tannins. The artificial substance also exhibits similar reactions to natural tannins in some chemical reactions.
